text: Chang Feng-hsu (; 5 August 1928 – 1 June 2014) was a Taiwanese politician. Born in Pingtung County, he served on the Taiwan Provincial Council before becoming the Pingtung County Magistrate in 1964. He was elected Mayor of Taipei in 1972, but served concurrently as county magistrate until 1973. In 1976, Chang was appointed Minister of the Interior, and stepped down in 1978. He later served as chairman of the Chinese Taipei Olympic Committee from 1987 to 1998. He died in 2014, aged 85, at Taipei Veterans General Hospital. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Magistrates of Pingtung County Category:Mayors of Taipei Category:Kuomintang politicians in Taiwan Category:Taiwanese Ministers of the Interior
title: Chang Feng-hsu
